video.title: The Road to Love
video.synopsis: After an argument with her dad, a young woman from a family of macho truck drivers is kicked out of the home and must make her own success as a trucker.

episodes.synopsis: When a loan shark tries to confiscate the Briceño family's prized semi-truck, daughter Chiqui makes a bold bet that could prevent them from losing it.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Chiqui breaks the difficult news to her father, whose strong reaction prompts Peluche to come to her aid. Toronja messes with the wrong man.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Too proud to reveal the betrayal she's suffered, Chiqui sends Peluche home and finds refuge with an old friend. Toronja and his father start new jobs.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A woman comes to Chiqui's defense and they become fast friends. Darío pressures Peluche to hook up with amorous Ramona so she will give them jobs.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Peluche hatches a risky plan so he and Darío can work night shifts for Ramona. Chiqui tries to impress her boss, and arranges to meet Samuel for dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Peluche uses a phone trick to find out Chiqui's new address so he and Lucía can pay her a surprise visit. Tati catches Samuel in a lie.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Peluche and Lucía surprise Chiqui in Santa Marta. Nina pulls a stunt to lure Blanca away from the truck lot. With Lucía gone, the Briceño men suffer.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: To keep up his ruse with Sofí, Breiner creates a fake social media profile. Amalfi mourns a lost dream. Peluche and Ilse get cozy during a night out.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Chiqui comes clean to her mother. Armando gets his medical test results. Toronja has an eventful and eye-opening first day of work with Octavio.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Breiner's new job furthers his false image -- but complicates his act. After Chiqui's rookie mistake, she and Peluche must put things right.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Darío learns Tulio found a buyer for the truck. Chiqui and Peluche's next job brings them face to face with Samuel. Breiner's charade falls apart.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: After being stood up by Dan, María José proposes a plan to Breiner. Tulio discovers what Darío has been up to. Cuqui helps Peluche find a job.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Ilse goes undercover to see if Samuel told Chiqui the truth. Blanca drops a bombshell on Darío. Florentino plans to fix the race so Peluche can't win.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: The winner of the race is crowned. The Briceño men confront Tulio. Chiqui meets with Samuel and asks him what his intentions are.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Blanca visits the Briceños to make amends. When Octavio forgets his wife's birthday while away on a trucking haul, Toronja steps in to save the day.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Tulio realizes he has lost a treasure: Blanca. Peluche proposes a business plan to Chiqui that will allow them to start their own transport company.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: An unforeseen event complicates the trucking haul that would enable Peluche and Chiqui to buy a truck. A musical opportunity presents itself to Amalfi.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Chiqui returns home and surprises her father. Samuel forces Tati to see a fertility specialist. Toronja recalls the moment he stopped singing in public.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Samuel finds something upsetting, and looks for Chiqui at her old workplace. Peluche reveals a wish to Chiqui. Toronja gets a bad case of stage fright.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Samuel tracks down the Briceños' address and shows up at their doorstep. Amalfi becomes suspicious of her husband. Breiner meets Sofí's cousin.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Chiqui seeks legal advice and meets privately with Samuel. Toronja has a run-in with an old nemesis that puts a lucrative job opportunity in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: The job Ramona gave to Peluche proves to be a tough one. Breiner reveals his true identity to Sofí. Chiqui tells her dad who the baby's father is.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Octavio and the Briceños compete for the contract. Samuel shows up unexpectedly at the Briceños' house to meet his child -- and the rest of the family.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Octavio asks Fito to find a loophole in the contract. Hoping to establish a relationship of mutual respect, Chiqui invites Samuel to a family dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Samuel makes Breiner an offer. Octavio tries to sabotage the Briceños' first job. Lucía overhears her husband having a suspicious phone conversation.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Toronja confronts his father at his appointment. Chiqui takes Deisy on an outing to help her bond with Samuel. Ilse proposes a bold idea to Peluche.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Fito focuses on a new target: Samuel. María José reconnects with Breiner. Sensing Peluche's ambivalence about moving, Chiqui gives him advice.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: María José confides in Breiner about her past, bringing the two closer together. Ilse discovers the identity of the woman whom Peluche is pining for.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Peluche secretly helps Chiqui train for the truck race. Stood up by Darío, Pili pays Nina a visit.  Octavio gathers ammunition to use against Samuel.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Toronja feels torn between his true passion for singing and his father's expectations. Pili schemes to keep Nina away from Darío.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Tati confronts Chiqui. Pili finds out Darío has another "friend with benefits" at a roadside motel. Amalfi receives an accidental phone call.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Chiqui helps Samuel figure out who really uploaded the video. Pili wins Lucía over to get closer to Darío. Peluche and Chiqui are caught kissing.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: The Briceño household is in an uproar over the new revelation. Breiner meets Sofí's parents. With Peluche's help, Chiqui secretly enters the truck race.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Tati agrees to a divorce, on one condition. The race's winner and the runner-up are revealed. Chiqui and Peluche decide to make a change in their lives.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Tati's father pulls a fast one on Samuel. Chiqui visits Ramona to ask for a job. Toronja and Amalfi audition for a singing-contest reality show.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Peluche finds a used truck for sale. The Briceños are made aware of the fine print in their contract. Octavio catches Amalfi leaving for an audition.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Cuqui's troubling call about Ilse sends Chiqui and Deisy to the coast -- on Samuel's visitation day. A health crisis causes Amalfi to rethink her plans.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Breiner worries about Sofí's family's visit. Octavio's other wife gets a call from the hospital. Samuel tries to get proof that Chiqui is an unfit mom.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Darío comes home to find an unexpected houseguest. Chiqui receives an upsetting piece of mail. Sofí and her parents arrive at the Briceño home.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Sofí's family experiences an unforgettable meal with the Briceños. Samuel presents evidence against Chiqui to the family court commissioner.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Breiner becomes a vegan. Darío encounters a trap designed to sabotage his delivery. To prevent Chiqui from losing Deisy, Peluche offers Samuel a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Darío scrambles to get his delivery back on track. Peluche is forced to hold up his end of the bargain that he made with Samuel. Pili shares her news.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Armando's insistence on driving jeopardizes the Briceños' contract. Octavio overhears his wife on the phone with Toronja. Samuel asks Tati for a job.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Tati sabotages Samuel's plans to visit Deisy so she can have him to herself. Chiqui and Toronja compete to see who can deliver a shipment the fastest.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Octavio's double life is exposed. To get past the obstacle Toronja has put in her path, Chiqui calls an ally. Sofí's parents make Breiner an offer.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Amalfi and Mirta get revenge against Octavio. María José helps Breiner apply for a scholarship.  Peluche sets out to restore his friendship with Chiqui.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Mirta urges Amalfi to forgive Toronja and disregard what others might think of their May-December romance. The Briceños gather to mourn a loss.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Samuel makes a sacrifice in order to throw a memorable baptism party, where Darío and Toronja debut their girlfriends and Pili drops a bombshell.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Majo infiltrates the party and lures Chiqui outside, where Peluche awaits. Breiner learns Sofí lied to him. Samuel begs Chiqui for a second chance.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Breiner and Majo go on a filmmaking adventure. Chiqui and Peluche try to convince drivers to work for their company. Pili is rushed to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Majo reveals her feelings to Breiner, while Sofí finds his secret meat stash. Breiner's video gives Chiqui an idea. A grieving Darío gets a new tattoo.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Breiner shares big news with Majo, who also has an announcement. Chiqui presents her proposals to the deputy minister. The reality show premieres on TV.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Octavio makes a scene at El Desparche while confronting Amalfi and Toronja. Nina has dinner with Darío's family. Peluche gives Samuel an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Samuel sets a plan in motion to destroy Chiqui's trust in Peluche. Darío moves in with Nina. Breiner invites Sofí on a moviemaking road trip.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Tati secretly gathers ammunition to break up Samuel and Chiqui. Darío gets a new job -- and a new look. Peluche tells Chiqui about his deal with Samuel.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: A video of Armando goes viral. The reality show airs the episode in which the masked singers reveal their faces. Peluche is forced to face his past.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Samuel stays one step ahead of Tati. Luz Marina gives Peluche answers to his long-burning questions. Breiner and Majo take Sofí and Dan to play tejo.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Breiner tries to convince Majo to stay in Bogotá. During the filming of his next performance on the reality show, Toronja drops a bombshell.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Sofí shows up unexpectedly to see Breiner and spots the security video footage on his laptop. Nina makes a misguided attempt to reconcile with Darío.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Peluche and Breiner track down the mysterious Pepa to find out what Samuel is involved in. Amalfi gives her first solo performance on the reality show.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Breiner begs Sofí to tell Chiqui the truth about Samuel. The Briceños go the extra mile to make the truck fleet shine. Peluche learns his mom's secret.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Toronja arrives to support Amalfi in the final round of the contest. The Briceños scramble to undo the damage to their fleet in time for the inspection.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Armando calls upon his vast network of contacts in the trucking industry to help track down the stolen trucks. The near future unfolds for the Briceños.
episodes.title: Episode 63
